mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW( REV_NO, MEMBER_ID, IMP_UID, REV_CONT, REV_DATE, REV_IMG, GOODS_STAR, GOODS_CODE )VALUES( REVIEW_TEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{impUid}, #{revCont}, SYSDATE, #{revImg}, #{goodsStar}, #{goodsCode} )
mapper.update: update review set REV_CONT=#{revCont} where REV_NO=#{revNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where goods_code like #{reviewCount}
